import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from '../services/food/food.service'; import { Food } from '../shared/models/food'; import { StarRatingComponent } from 'ng-starrating/components/star-rating/star-rating.component'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { foods:Food[]=[]; constructor(private fs:FoodService, private router:ActivatedRoute){} //retrieve image data using service ngOnInit(): void { this.router.params.subscribe(params=>{ if(URLSearchParams.searchItem) this.foods=this.fs.getAll().filter }) this.foods=this.fs.getAll(); //all image come in foods } }
